1. How to make a grouped frequency distribution table where the data in respect of concentration of sulphur dioxide in the air of a certain city for the last few days is given along with class intervals.

3. The students will learn to form a frequency distribution table when the data in respect of the value of π up to many decimal places is given.

4. How to form a grouped frequency distribution table when the data in respect of many students is given who watched the TV programmes for different hours in the previous week.

5. The students will also learn to construct a grouped frequency distribution table where the data in respect of lives of few car batteries is given.

6. When the large amount of data is to be presented, we can condense the data in to groups and these groupings are called “classes” or “class-intervals” and their size is called the class-size or class width. In each of these groupings/classes, the least number is called the lower class limit and the greater number is called the upper class limit.

courseDetails.title: Mastering Data Magic : Power BI + Tableau  + SQL , Analytics
courseDetails.shortDescription: Data Analytics with Power BI , Tableau and SQL
courseDetails.longDescription:
1. Data Analytics: Data analytics is the process of examining, cleaning, transforming, and interpreting data to extract meaningful insights, patterns, and trends. It helps organizations make informed decisions and improve their business performance by leveraging data.

  2. Why Data Analytics: Data analytics is crucial for businesses to make data-driven decisions. It enables organizations to:

    • Identify trends and opportunities.

    • Improve operational efficiency.

    • Enhance customer experience.

    • Make informed strategic decisions.

    • Predict future outcomes.

  3. Types of Data Analytics: There are four main types of data analytics:

    • Descriptive Analytics: Summarizes historical data to provide insights.

    • Diagnostic Analytics: Analyzes data to understand why certain events occurred.

    • Predictive Analytics: Uses historical data to predict future outcomes.

    • Prescriptive Analytics: Recommends actions based on predictive analytics.

  4. Steps Involved in Data Analytics: The typical steps in data analytics include data collection, data cleaning, data exploration, data modeling, data visualization, and interpretation of results.

  5. Tools for Data Analytics: There are various tools for data analytics, including Power BI, Tableau, Excel, Python (with libraries like Pandas and Matplotlib), R, and more.

  6. Skills for Data Analytics: To excel in data analytics, you should have skills in data manipulation, statistical analysis, data visualization, domain knowledge, and problem-solving. Soft skills like communication and teamwork are also essential.

  7. Downloading and Installing Power BI Desktop: You can download Power BI Desktop from the official Microsoft website. After downloading, run the installer and follow the installation instructions.

  8. Understanding Interface, Options, and Settings: Power BI Desktop has a user-friendly interface with options and settings to customize your workspace, data sources, and report layouts.

  9. Data Source and Uploading Sample Data: You can connect Power BI to various data sources, such as databases, Excel files, and web services. You can also import sample data to practice.

  10. Understanding Data and Basic Data Types: In Power BI, you must understand your data's structure, data types (e.g., text, numbers, dates), and how to clean and transform it for analysis.

  11. Building Charts: Power BI allows you to create various visualizations, including bar charts, line charts, pie charts, and more, to represent your data effectively.

  12. Visual Interactions: You can set up interactions between visuals to create dynamic reports where selecting one visual influences others.

  13. Formatting: You can format visuals, fonts, colors, and backgrounds to make your reports visually appealing and easier to understand.

  14. Web Scraping: Power BI can extract data from websites using web scraping techniques, allowing you to incorporate external data sources.

  15. Data Modeling: You can create relationships between tables, define measures, and build a data model for accurate analysis and reporting.

  16. RDBMS Introduction: Relational Database Management Systems (RDBMS) like SQL Server, MySQL, and Oracle can be connected to Power BI to fetch data.

  17. Map Visualization: Power BI supports mapping visualizations to display data geospatially, making it useful for location-based analysis.

  18. Saving Power BI Files: You can save your Power BI reports as .pbix files, which can be shared and opened by others using Power BI Desktop.

  19. Scatter Plot and Other Features: Scatter plots are useful for visualizing the relationship between two numeric variables. Power BI also offers many other features like filtering, drill-through, and custom visuals.

  20. Conditional Formatting: You can apply conditional formatting to visuals to highlight specific data points based on predefined rules.

  21. Hiding Tables in Report View: You can hide tables or fields that you don't want to display in the report view to declutter your workspace.

  22. Grouping, Bar Charts, Column Charts, Ribbon Charts, Small Multiples: These are various visualization types that you can create in Power BI to represent your data in different ways, such as grouping data, using bar or column charts, ribbon charts, and displaying small multiples for comparative analysis.

Power BI is a powerful tool for data analytics, and mastering these topics will help you create informative and visually appealing reports for data-driven decision-making.
targetAudiences: This course is designed for data enthusiasts, analysts, business professionals, and anyone looking to harness the power of Power BI for in-depth data analysis and visualization.

courseDetails.title: Excel Formulas & Functions Basic to Advanced
courseDetails.shortDescription: Advanced Microsoft Excel Formulas And Functions , Logical, Index, Match, Vlookup, Hlookup and More
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the ultimate Excel formulas and functions mastery course! "Excel Formulas & Functions: Basic to Advanced" is your comprehensive guide to unlocking the full potential of Microsoft Excel by mastering its powerful set of formulas and functions, from the fundamental to the advanced levels.


Excel is more than just a spreadsheet; it's a robust tool for data analysis, manipulation, and visualization, and its formulas and functions are at the heart of its capabilities. Whether you're a beginner looking to understand the basics or an intermediate user seeking to elevate your skills, this course covers everything you need to know about Excel formulas and functions.


Key Learning Objectives:


  • Fundamentals of Excel Formulas: Understand the basics of formulas, cell references, arithmetic operators, and common functions.

  • Logical and Text Functions: Dive into logical functions (IF, AND, OR) and text functions (CONCATENATE, LEFT, RIGHT) for data manipulation.

  • Lookup and Reference Functions: Master lookup functions (VLOOKUP, HLOOKUP, INDEX, MATCH) to find and retrieve data efficiently.

  • Mathematical and Statistical Functions: Explore mathematical (SUM, AVERAGE, COUNT) and statistical functions for data analysis.

  • Date and Time Functions: Learn date and time functions (TODAY, NOW, DATE, TIME) to manage and manipulate date-related data.

  • Advanced Functions: Delve into advanced functions like nested functions, array formulas, and financial functions for complex calculations.

  • Error Handling and Troubleshooting: Understand error handling techniques and troubleshooting common formula errors.


Why Choose This Course?


  • Comprehensive Curriculum: This course covers Excel formulas and functions from basic to advanced levels, catering to learners of all proficiency levels.

  • Hands On Learning: Practice what you learn with guided exercises, practical examples, and real-world scenarios to reinforce your understanding.

  • Expert Instruction: Benefit from the guidance of experienced instructors passionate about Excel and dedicated to helping you master formulas and functions.

  • Lifetime Access: Enroll once and enjoy lifetime access to the course materials, allowing you to learn at your own pace and revisit topics whenever necessary.

  • Career Enhancement: Excel proficiency with formulas and functions is highly valued in various professions, making this course a career enhancer.


Become an Excel formulas and functions maestro! Enroll now in "Excel Formulas & Functions: Basic to Advanced" and acquire the skills needed to handle complex calculations, data analysis, and manipulation with confidence. Don't miss this opportunity to become a proficient Excel user and add immense value to your professional toolkit!
targetAudiences: Anyone Who Work with Excel for Formulas and Functions.
Anyone Interested in Becoming a Proficient Excel User.

courseDetails.title: Mini MBA in Innovations and Digital Transformation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mini MBA by MTF Institute, Major: Innovations and Digital + General Management, Leadership, Marketing, Finance, Strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Mini MBA by MTF Institute

With Main Concentration in Innovations and Digital Transformation


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


Program Modules:

Module 1: General Management

Module 2: Leadership

Module 3: Marketing Management

Module 4: Finance Management

Module 5: Business Strategy

Module 6: Innovations (The Main Concentration)

Module 7: Digital Transformation (The Main Concentration)


Learning programs in Innovation and Digital Transformation are crucial for both companies and experts in today's rapidly evolving business landscape. These programs encompass a range of topics and skills that are essential for staying competitive, adapting to changing market dynamics, and fostering professional growth. Here's why these programs are important for companies and experts alike:


For Companies:

Stay Competitive: In the digital age, innovation is the key to staying competitive. Companies that fail to innovate risk becoming obsolete. Learning programs in innovation and digital transformation provide employees with the knowledge and skills to identify emerging trends, technologies, and business models, allowing their companies to adapt and thrive.


Adapt to Changing Markets: Markets are constantly evolving, and consumer preferences are shifting faster than ever before. Companies need to be agile and responsive to these changes. A workforce well-versed in digital transformation can help organizations pivot and adjust their strategies accordingly.


Efficiency and Cost Savings: Digital transformation often involves automation and process optimization, leading to increased efficiency and cost savings. Employees trained in these areas can identify opportunities to streamline operations, reduce waste, and improve overall productivity.


Customer-Centricity: Digital transformation is often driven by the need to better understand and serve customers. Learning programs in this area can teach employees how to gather and analyze customer data, leading to more personalized and effective marketing, sales, and customer service strategies.


Innovation Culture: Innovation is not limited to R&D departments. It should permeate an organization's culture. Training programs can help employees develop an innovation mindset, encouraging them to proactively seek out opportunities for improvement and innovation.


Risk Management: The digital world is fraught with security and compliance risks. Learning programs in digital transformation can educate employees about cybersecurity best practices, data protection, and regulatory compliance, reducing the organization's exposure to potential risks.


For Experts:

Career Advancement: Professionals who possess skills in innovation and digital transformation are in high demand. Acquiring these skills can open up new career opportunities and increase earning potential.


Relevance: Staying current in a rapidly changing job market is essential. Learning about the latest trends and technologies ensures that experts remain relevant and marketable in their respective fields.


Entrepreneurship: For those interested in entrepreneurship, understanding digital transformation and innovation is critical for launching and scaling successful startups. These skills enable entrepreneurs to disrupt industries and create innovative solutions.


Problem-Solving: Innovation and digital transformation programs equip professionals with problem-solving skills that can be applied to a wide range of challenges in various industries. These problem-solving abilities are highly transferable and valuable.


Networking Opportunities: Participating in learning programs often leads to networking opportunities with peers, mentors, and industry leaders. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new career prospects and collaborations.


Personal Growth: Learning new skills and staying up-to-date with industry trends can be personally fulfilling. It can boost confidence and provide a sense of accomplishment, which in turn can enhance job satisfaction and overall well-being.


Learning programs in innovation and digital transformation are essential for both companies and experts. They enable organizations to thrive in a rapidly changing business environment and empower individuals to advance their careers, contribute to their organizations, and make a meaningful impact on their industries.


Mini MBA programs have gained significant popularity in recent years as a valuable educational option for both employers and experts seeking to enhance their careers or start their own businesses. These condensed, focused programs offer a taste of traditional MBA coursework without the time and financial commitments required by full-length MBA programs. Here's why Mini MBA programs are important for building careers and businesses:

1. Skill Enhancement: Mini MBA programs provide participants with a comprehensive understanding of key business principles, such as finance, marketing, strategy, and leadership. This knowledge equips individuals with the skills necessary to excel in their current roles or transition into new ones. Employers can benefit from employees who possess a broader skill set and can contribute more effectively to the organization's success.

2. Cost-Effective: Mini MBA programs are typically more affordable than full-length MBA programs, making them accessible to a wider range of professionals. This affordability allows individuals to invest in their education without incurring substantial debt, making it a viable option for those looking to advance their careers or start their own businesses.

3. Time Efficiency: Many professionals cannot commit to the two-year duration of a traditional MBA program due to work and personal commitments. Mini MBA programs are designed to be completed in a shorter time frame, often a few months, making it possible for individuals to balance their education with their existing responsibilities.

4. Networking Opportunities: Mini MBA programs often bring together a diverse group of professionals from various industries and backgrounds. This diversity fosters valuable networking opportunities, enabling participants to connect with peers, instructors, and industry experts. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new career opportunities and potential business collaborations.

5. Entrepreneurial Skill Development: Mini MBA programs are particularly beneficial for aspiring entrepreneurs. They offer insights into business planning, finance, marketing, and strategy – all critical aspects of launching and running a successful business. Entrepreneurs can use the knowledge gained from a Mini MBA program to make informed decisions and navigate the complexities of entrepreneurship.

6. Adaptability and Continuous Learning: In today's rapidly changing business landscape, adaptability and continuous learning are essential. Mini MBA programs provide participants with up-to-date knowledge and skills that can help them stay relevant and competitive in their careers. Employers value employees who are committed to ongoing learning and development.

7. Career Advancement: For employees looking to advance within their organizations, a Mini MBA can be a valuable asset. It demonstrates a commitment to professional growth and can make individuals more competitive for promotions and leadership positions.

8. Confidence Building: Mini MBA programs can boost the confidence of both employees and aspiring entrepreneurs. Knowing that you have a solid foundation in business concepts and strategies can empower you to take on new challenges and seize opportunities.

Mini MBA programs offer a cost-effective, time-efficient, and comprehensive way for both employers and experts to enhance their skills, advance their careers, and build successful businesses. Whether you are seeking career growth within an organization or aiming to launch your own venture, a Mini MBA program can provide the knowledge and confidence needed to achieve your goals in the dynamic world of business.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Self-Guided Learning with ChatGPT: 75 mins Quick Start Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: ChatGPT, Self-Guided Learning, Personal Productivity, Career Development, Career Growth, AI, Gemini, Self Learning
courseDetails.longDescription:
In an age where artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning are reshaping the landscape of nearly every industry, the ability to learn independently and efficiently has never been more critical. This course is a comprehensive online course designed to equip learners with the tools and strategies necessary to harness the power of AI, specifically ChatGPT, for personal and professional growth.

Why Take This Course?

This course is tailored for individuals who aim to stay ahead of the curve by leveraging AI to enhance their productivity and learning capabilities. Whether you're a young professional eager to accelerate your career, a team leader looking to foster a culture of continuous improvement, or a lifelong learner passionate about exploring the potentials of AI, this course offers valuable insights and practical skills to achieve your objectives.

What You Will Learn:

  • Foundations of ChatGPT and AI: Understand the basics of how ChatGPT and similar AI technologies work, setting the stage for effective utilization.

  • Strategies for Effective Self-Learning: Learn how to formulate questions and curate information using AI, turning the vast internet into a personalized learning resource.

  • Enhancing Productivity with AI: Discover how to integrate ChatGPT into your daily routines to boost productivity when collecting information.

  • Critical Evaluation of AI-Sourced Information: Develop the skills to critically assess the credibility of information provided by AI, ensuring your knowledge base is accurate and reliable.

  • 10 Demonstrations across various domains to showcase the methods to use AI and traditional search in collaboration to speed up converting information to knowledge.

Information vs Knowledege

Information and knowledge, while often used interchangeably, hold distinct differences. Information is the raw material, the facts and details we gather from various sources. It answers the "what" and "where" questions, providing building blocks for understanding. Knowledge, on the other hand, is the processed version of information. It involves the "how" and "why," encompassing not just facts, but also the understanding and interpretation of those facts. Knowledge is built upon information through experience, reflection, and analysis, allowing us to apply information to solve problems, make decisions, and draw informed conclusions. In essence, information is the "what" we know, while knowledge is the "how" and "why" we know it.


Course Requirements:

This course is accessible to all eager learners. No prior experience with AI, ChatGPT, or specific technical skills are required. All you need is an internet connection, a willingness to learn, and a curiosity about the potential of artificial intelligence in enhancing productivity.


Who Should Enroll:

  • Professionals across all industries looking to boost productivity

  • Team leaders and managers aiming to foster a learning culture

  • Individuals interested in AI, machine learning, and their practical applications

  • Career changers and lifelong learners seeking to upskill efficiently

Take the first step towards leveraging AI for your growth. You're not just learning; you're preparing to lead in the AI-driven future.
targetAudiences: Team Leaders and Managers: Current and aspiring leaders seeking to foster a culture of continuous learning within their teams. This course will provide them with the tools to guide their teams towards innovation and adaptability in a rapidly changing professional landscape.

Young Professionals and Recent Graduates: Individuals at the onset of their careers who wish to build a strong foundation in self-directed learning to accelerate their career growth and adapt to workplace challenges effectively.
Career Changers: Individuals looking to pivot to new industries or roles and require a structured approach to learning new skills and knowledge areas efficiently and effectively.

Lifelong Learners: Anyone with a passion for continuous personal and professional growth who desires to refine their approach to learning, ensuring they remain relevant and competitive in their field.

courseDetails.title: Microsoft SQL pour les débutants: Le cours de A à Z
courseDetails.shortDescription: Un guide complet pour écrire des requêtes SQL dans Microsoft SQL Server
courseDetails.longDescription:
Les bases de données sont cruciales dans le processus de développement logiciel typique, et les développeurs utilisent SQL (Structural Query Language) pour communiquer avec les bases de données. Sorti en 1989, Microsoft SQL Server est l'un des moteurs de base de données les plus populaires au monde, et c'est un incontournable pour quiconque souhaite devenir un expert.

Lors du développement de logiciels, les développeurs ont besoin d'un serveur de base de données pour stocker les informations qu'ils collectent auprès des utilisateurs potentiels, et Microsoft SQL Server est une option intéressante. Microsoft SQL Server est le troisième système de gestion de base de données le plus populaire, derrière Oracle SQL Developer et MySQL. À partir de ces données, il est clair qu'il existe des opportunités sur le marché pour les développeurs Microsoft SQL expérimentés.

QuickNode

QuickNode simplifies blockchain infrastructure for teams big & small. A lightning-fast global API provides access to 22+ blockchains and 35+ networks. Plus high-leverage tools (NFT/Token API, Graph API, QuickAlerts, Marketplace, etc...) and expert support to evolve, enhance, and push the boundaries of your app. A comprehensive blockchain developer platform, trusted by top Web3 projects & businesses. QuickNode is helping the blockchain ecosystem grow since 2017


Course Description

What we're going to build:

— A token balance app where you enter a wallet address and get all the tokens in the wallet and all the token balances

— In addition to balances, fetch a detailed history of incoming and outgoing transfers of a particular token within a wallet.


What you will learn from this workshop:

— How to quickly build an app from scratch

— How to connect to blockchain

— How to use QuickNode Marketplace add-ons and Advanced APIs to quickly fetch and show blockchain data

— How to style your app


Building the Web3 Token Balance App: A Comprehensive Workshop

The world of technology is constantly evolving, and with the rise of blockchain and decentralized applications, understanding Web3 has become essential for anyone looking to stay relevant and competitive in the tech industry. This course, "Building the Web3 Token Balance App," offers a comprehensive journey into the world of Web3 and blockchain development. Through hands-on projects and practical guidance, participants will gain a deep understanding of Web3 concepts and how to apply them to create a functional token balance app.


In this immersive workshop, you will learn how to build a token balance app that allows users to enter a wallet address and retrieve information about all the tokens held in that wallet, along with their respective balances. Moreover, you will learn how to fetch a detailed history of incoming and outgoing transfers for a specific token within a wallet. By the end of this course, you will not only have a functional Web3 application but also the skills and knowledge needed to explore further possibilities in blockchain development.


Why Web3 is Important for Your Career

Web3 represents the future of the internet and offers exciting career opportunities. Understanding and mastering Web3 concepts can significantly enhance your career prospects. Here's why:


High Demand for Web3 Developers: As the adoption of blockchain technology and decentralized applications grows, there is a rising demand for developers who can build Web3 applications. Companies and startups in various industries are looking for talent with Web3 skills.


Innovation and Entrepreneurship: Web3 opens up new avenues for innovation and entrepreneurship. By building Web3 applications, you can create your own decentralized projects, collaborate with blockchain startups, or even develop your unique tokens or cryptocurrencies.


Decentralization and Security: Web3 applications operate on decentralized networks, making them more resistant to censorship and cyberattacks. Understanding Web3 technology can be crucial for building secure and resilient applications, which is a top priority for businesses and organizations.


Financial Opportunities: The blockchain industry has created new financial opportunities, including careers in cryptocurrency trading, token investment, and blockchain consulting. A solid understanding of Web3 is essential to navigate this space effectively.


In the rapidly evolving world of technology, Web3 is at the forefront of innovation. Building a career in Web3 development offers exciting opportunities in a wide range of industries, from finance to healthcare and beyond. This course, "Building the Web3 Token Balance App," equips you with the essential skills and knowledge needed to thrive in this dynamic field. Whether you aspire to work for leading blockchain companies, start your own Web3 project, or simply understand the technology shaping our future, this workshop is your gateway to success in the world of Web3 and blockchain development. Join us on this journey, and let's build the future together!

courseDetails.title: Brainteasers pour les entretiens en Conseil & Finance
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cours Rapide sur les brainteasers, tests de logique, estimations, market sizing… révision rapide pour bien s’y préparer
courseDetails.longDescription:
Certains des aspects les plus angoissants des entretiens d'embauche sont la folie impromptue des questions posées, qui peuvent être encore plus bizarres que les questions d'analyse financière les plus complexes. Ne paniquez pas; au lieu de cela, prenez des précautions.

L'inflation, les prix des obligations et les taux d'intérêt peuvent être théoriquement expliqués, mais cela ne vous aidera pas si un employeur potentiel vous demande combien de ballons à l'hélium vous pouvez mettre dans un avion A380. Malgré le fait que cela n'a aucune incidence sur le rôle que vous recherchez, ce type de question est populaire dans des secteurs comme le conseil en stratégie et la banque d'investissement. Pourquoi ces questions ? Pour s'assurer que les recrues potentielles peuvent penser de manière critique dans des contraintes de temps et avec des informations limitées.

Vous n'avez pas besoin de tout savoir sur Wikipédia par cœur pour avoir une chance de répondre à ces questions. Tout comme un bon problème de mathématiques, le processus est bien plus important que la réponse finale. Certains professionnels des ressources humaines sont même d'avis qu'il n'est pas nécessaire de trouver la solution exacte, pourvu que votre raisonnement soit rigoureux et précis. Par conséquent, vous devez vous concentrer sur votre capacité à évaluer un nouveau scénario et à tirer des conclusions étayées quantitativement.

À première vue, les questions peuvent sembler être d'une grande variété et d'un niveau de difficulté très élevé. Méfiez-vous cependant; l'intervieweur peut ne pas rechercher la précision. Son objectif est de jauger la capacité de logique et d'analyse du candidat. Il est donc crucial de détailler les étapes utilisées pour résoudre le problème et pourquoi elles ont été prises dans un ordre particulier. Et assurez-vous d'être très clair, précis et bref.

Malheureusement, de nombreux étudiants ne sont pas préparés lorsqu'il s'agit de résoudre un brainteaser ou faire un market sizing. Et c'est tout l'intérêt de cette formation ! De quelles vérités universelles doit-on être conscient ? Quelles échelles de grandeur devez-vous comprendre ? Comment déterminer la taille réelle d'un marché sans s'embourber dans les détails. Vous apprendrez tout ce que vous devez savoir pour réussir cette partie de l'entretien grâce à cette formation.

C'est un cours intensif qui convient aux personnes voulant faire une révision rapide de cette partie de l'entretien. Si vous êtes à la recherche d'un cours qui commence par les bases et passe aux sujets avancés rapidement, c'est le meilleur cours pour vous.
targetAudiences: Tous ceux qui veulent travailler dans le conseil en stratégie et la banque d'affaire
Les débutants qui cherchent à commencer leurs entraînements très tôt
Les personnes sous pression cherchant à réviser les brainteasers et market sizings la veille d'un entretien d'embauche

Vous en apprendrez également davantage sur les différents aspects de l’exploitation minière et du trading de crypto-monnaie, ainsi que sur les stratégies et tactiques impliquées pour vous aider à croître, à créer et à accumuler de la richesse. courseDetails.longDescription:
VBA (Visual Basic for Application) est un langage utilisé pour programmer des tâches et des actions dans Excel ou développer des fonctions supplémentaires dans des feuilles de calcul Excel adaptées à vos besoins de travail.

Si vous souhaitez apprendre à programmer VBA pour votre entreprise ou pour vous-même, ce cours vous est destiné. En tant que cours pour débutants, vous apprendrez les bases de la compréhension de VBA et de ce qu'il fait. Vous apprendrez comment enregistrer votre première macro, suivi d'un développement progressif dans l'apprentissage de tout le langage fondamental VBA menant à la création de votre propre module VBA.

A la fin du cours, vous aurez appris à créer vos formulaires d'utilisateur avec lesquels d'autres utilisateurs pourront interagir et saisir leurs données.

Vous pourrez ensuite dépanner et déboguer vos codes en les rendant efficaces et plus rapides tout en créant vos propres fonctions Excel personnalisées.

L'un des nombreux aspects de VBA est que lorsque vous l'apprenez, vous le savez, et il devient une partie de vous pour toujours et à long terme, vous pouvez le programmer pour faire tout votre travail.


Pourquoi suivre ce cours ?

Automatisez votre travail : vous apprenez à utiliser VBA pour automatiser les procédures, les rapports d'activités. Tout cela peut être configurés à l'aide de VBA et, d'une simple pression sur un bouton, vous pouvez générer votre rapport et vous aider à effectuer différentes actions en appuyant sur un bouton.

Accélérez votre travail : utilisez VBA pour gagner du temps en automatisant la tâche répétitive. Accélérez votre travail en utilisant la macro VBA pour automatiser les actions répétitives. VBA Excel permet de gagner du temps en terminant la même action sur plusieurs classeurs Excel, ce qui vous fait gagner beaucoup de temps grâce à une action automatisée.

Il est conçu pour les débutants : ce cours est un guide étape par étape pour une compréhension facile pour les personnes qui n'ont aucune connaissance de ce qu'est VBA mais qui ont des connaissances sur Excel.
targetAudiences: Ce programme VBA Excel est destiné aux débutants sans connaissances préalables sur VBA
Pour une expérience personnelle ou pour votre travail, ou votre entreprise, et pour tous ceux qui cherchent à ajouter une signification supplémentaire à leurs connaissances et compétences.

courseDetails.title: NFT pour les Débutants: Devenir Investisseur et Créateur NFT
courseDetails.shortDescription: Étudier les collections NFT, les marchés NFT, les cas d'utilisation NFT, le NFT Minting, l'achat et la vente d'NFTs
courseDetails.longDescription:
Depuis que le Bitcoin a forcé la plupart des gens à se familiariser avec les crypto-monnaies ces dernières années, aucune autre technologie n'a suscité autant d'attention que les NFT. Fonctionnant sur la même technologie blockchain que la plupart des crypto-monnaies, les NFTs c'est comme les crytpos, mais dans un autre but.

Ce cours vous montre comment les NFT fonctionnent et leur lien avec la technologie blockchain. Vous apprendrez l'aspect théorique de cette nouvelle technologie et quelle fonction elle remplit dans la vie réelle. Ce cours est un guide tout-en-un qui convient aussi bien aux amateurs qu'aux professionnels.

Pour faciliter la compréhension du cours, il est séparé en plusieurs sous-sections. Il est conçu pour aider les débutants et les experts à s'orienter plus efficacement pendant le cours.

Si c'est la première fois que vous entendez parler des NFT, je vous recommande de suivre le plan du cours tel qu'il est organisé. Il vous aidera à donner un sens au monde déjà déroutant des NFT. Les ressources d'apprentissage contiennent également des recommandations de sites et de logiciels pour vous aider à démarrer.

Bien qu'il soit facile de monnayer, d'acheter et de vendre des NFT sans formation appropriée, il est important de savoir à quoi s'en tenir. Ainsi, il sera plus facile d'inviter les gens dans le monde des NFT, car vous saurez ce que vous pouvez leur dire pour les intéresser.
targetAudiences: Les professionnels ou les étudiants qui souhaitent s'aventurer dans le domaine des NFT et qui sont désireux d'apprendre la science qui se cache en-dessous
Les artistes qui rêvent de proposer leurs œuvres sous forme de NFT et qui cherchent à explorer les possibilités et les options
Les galeries d'art qui souhaitent collecter et préserver l'art numérique
Toute personne désireuse de connaître les meilleures méthodes pour créer, collecter et vendre des NFT

courseDetails.title: Терминал Linux. Основы работы в командной строке.
courseDetails.shortDescription: Авторский видеокурс от преподавателя онлайн школ GeekBrains и Otus.
courseDetails.longDescription:
У данного курса также есть бесплатная краткая версия (первые 2 часа видео). Ее можно найти в профиле автора.


Кому сегодня нужен Linux?
Программисту? - Да.
Тестировщику? - Да.
ИТ менеджеру? - Да.
Студенту ИТ университета? - Да!
Любому, интересующемуся АйТишечкой!
Всем - Linux! И добро пожаловать на борт!


Мы привыкли управлять нашими компьютерами с помощью мышки и в красивом графическом интерфейсе пользователя (GUI). Но это не путь Linux! Здесь по умолчанию все управляется текстовыми командами в Терминале. И, пройдя этот курс, Вы убедитесь, что это на самом деле более, чем удобно!


В материалах курса собраны наиболее широко используемые команды, позволяющие быстро начать работать в ОС Linux. Скучные и длинные лекции - не наш формат. Если Вы цените свое время, то здесь Вы найдете выжимку знаний, которые Вам действительно понадобятся для освоения этой операционной системы.


Курс основан на Linux Ubuntu, но любой другой популярный дистрибутив, который есть у Вас под рукой, также подойдет.


Вы узнаете про трюки и лайфхаки, которые помогут быстрее выполнять типовые операции. Познакомитесь со всеми необходимыми командами для работы с файлами и папками. Освоите работу с просмотрщиками файлов и самыми популярными текстовыми редакторами. И научитесь эффективно использовать поиск. Если забыли какую-то команду, которая Вам нужна или Вы не знаете, какую из них использовать для той или иной задачи, - в этом курсе мы обсудим способы поиска необходимых инструментов и инструкции к ним (вызов краткой и подробной справки).


Целевая аудитория: любой, желающий познакомиться с Linux.


Дерзайте!
targetAudiences: Студенты университетов и колледжей.
Выпускники ВУЗов и работники ИТ индустрии.
Разработчики ПО, сисадмины, DevOps.
Любой, кто интересуется ОС Linux.

courseDetails.title: Formation WordPress: Créez 1 Site rapidement en partant de 0

WordPress est un excellent outil à avoir dans votre poche arrière si vous souhaitez créer des sites Web professionnels. Ce cours vous montrera exactement comment faire cela.

Soyez opérationnel avec ce cours facile à suivre pour tout ce que vous devez savoir sur WordPress, de l’installation de votre premier site à sa maintenance après son lancement.

Vous commencerez par les blocs de constructions et l’installation de WordPress. Vous apprendrez ensuite les principaux éléments constitutifs du panneau d’administration WordPress.

Vous apprendrez également à connaitre le référencement et les tags Meta.

La dernière partie de ce cours portera sur les thèmes qui donnent à votre site un aspect professionnel et lui donnent le design que vous aimez. Vous apprendrez également à créer vos propres thèmes.


Pourquoi choisir ce cours?

Créé pour les novices: Ce cours sur WordPress a été conçu d’un point de vue de novice pour fournir un guide étape par étape depuis le début jusqu’à la mise en ligne de votre site Web.

Apprenez grâce au conseil d’un professionnel : Nous vous expliquerons toutes les options de WordPress, leurs utilisations et bien d’autres choses. Vous explorerez Wordpress à travers les yeux d’un professionnel comment créer votre site web avec WordPress. A la fin de ce cours, vous aurez un site web don’t vous pourrez être fier.

Pas d’expérience de programmation requise : Ce tutorial WordPress pour novice est une ressource fantastique pour construire son site web – sans expérience ni connaissance de code. Ce guide est parfait pour vous, que vous n’ayez aucune connaissance en HTML, CSS, JavaScript ou PHP et si vous vouliez créer un blog de qualité.


Le tutorial WordPress ultime pour les novices !

Si vous êtes intéressés par créer votre blog mais intimidés par la complexité que cela représente, ce cours est pour vous ! Tout ce dont vous avez besoin, c’est un ordinateur avec une connexion internet et un module de recherche. Vous n’avez pas besoin de connaissance de code ou de programmation.

Deviens un professionnel de WordPress avec ce cours!
targetAudiences: Tous ceux qui veulent créer un site web pour son business, passe-temps ou encore pour un client

Si vous avez besoin de reprendre un site Wordpress existant ou d'en créer un à partir de rien mais que vous ne savez pas par où commencer, ce cours est fait pour vous
Toute personne aspirant à devenir un expert Wordpress devrait suivre ce cours

courseDetails.title: Analyse de Données avec Python: Numpy, Pandas et Matplotlib
courseDetails.shortDescription: Maîtriser les bibliothèques Python pour la Data Science et le Traitement de Données: Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, et plus!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Dans le marché du travail concurrentiel actuel, les data scientists sont tellement demandés qu’ils sont difficiles à garder. En effet, les personnes ayant une formation scientifique, informatique ainsi que des capacités analytiques sont difficiles à trouver.

Comme les "quants" de Wall Street dans les années 1980 et 1990, les data scientists d'aujourd'hui sont censés avoir des compétences similaires. Les personnes ayant une formation en physique et en mathématiques ont afflué vers les banques d'investissement et les fonds spéculatifs à cette époque parce qu'elles pouvaient proposer de nouveaux algorithmes et méthodes de données.

Ceci dit, la science des données est en train de devenir l'une des professions les mieux demandées du XXIe siècle. C’est un siècle ou beaucoup de choses sont informatisées, axées sur la programmation et de nature analytique. Par conséquent, il n'est pas surprenant que le besoin de spécialistes des données ait augmenté sur le marché de l'emploi au cours des dernières années.

L'offre, en revanche, est assez restreinte. Il est difficile d'acquérir les connaissances et les capacités requises pour travailler en tant que data scientist.

De nombreuses ressources pour apprendre Python sont disponibles en ligne. Pour cette raison, les étudiants sont souvent dépassés par la courbe d'apprentissage élevée de Python.

C'est pourquoi ce cours a été adapté pour vous que vous réussissiez ! L'instruction étape par étape est la marque de fabrique de ce cours. Tout au long de chaque leçon, nous continuons à construire sur ce que nous avons appris précédemment. Notre objectif est de vous doter de tous les outils et compétences dont vous avez besoin pour maîtriser Python, Numpy, Pandas & Matplotlib.

Vous repartirez de chaque vidéo avec une nouvelle idée que vous pourrez mettre en pratique immédiatement !

Tous les niveaux de compétence sont les bienvenus dans ce cours, et même si vous n'avez aucune expérience préalable en programmation ou en statistiques, vous serez en mesure de réussir !
targetAudiences: Débutants en programmation qui souhaitent étudier toutes les bibliothèques scientifiques en Python de bout en bout (Numpy, Pandas et Matplotlib)
Chercheurs intéressés par les bibliothèques Python pour la science des données
Les aspirants data scientists qui veulent élargir leurs connaissances
Une personne qui veut apprendre à analyser et à visualiser des données

courseDetails.title: Malware Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Malware Analysis For Beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
Malware analysis is the use of tools and programs to understand the behavior and purpose of suspicious files. The process is designed to identify and mitigate any potential threats. This hands-on process enables analysts to understand malware functionality, purpose, and potential impact. To achieve this, security teams use malware analysis tools. They typically rate and score specific malware samples in a closed environment called a sandbox.

Malware analysis is the study or process of determining the function, origin, and potential impact of a particular malware sample, such as a virus, worm, Trojan horse, rootkit, or backdoor. Malware, or malicious software, is any computer software designed to impair the operation of a host computer, steal a system, or steal sensitive data from a user, organization, or company. Malware may include software that collects user information without permission.

In this course you will learn the basics of malware analysis. It's a course for total beginners, not for people already familiar with cyber security concepts. If you are interested in Cyber Security, but don't know where to start, this course is for you. You will learn the basics of malware analysis. Given any file, you will be able to say if it is potential malware or not. You will understand how virus scanners find malware.
targetAudiences: Beginner Cyber Security Professionals
Beginner Ethical Hackers

courseDetails.title: Android Malware Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Analyse any Android app
courseDetails.longDescription:
Malware is a significant problem and threat. With hundreds of apps available. How can you know if apps you install are safe? Most people have no idea. In fact, that is why malware is such a big problem. Advanced malware may even hide from the anti-virus software.

This course teaches you the basics of Android Malware Analysis. You'll be able to check any Android app for malicious activity. You'll be able to see which countries the app connects to, what permissions it has and much more.

It's a beginners course and you don't need any prior knowledge. Not even Kali Linux is required to start with this course. By the end of this course, you'll be able to analyse an Android app and tell if it is likely malicious or not. Even existing apps can be tampered with, that look and behave exactly the same as the vendors app - except that malware has been added on top of it.

If you are an Android user and want to check apps, or a Cyber Security professional or a beginner Ethical Hacker, this course is for you!

The course doesn't require any advanced programming knowledge nor hacking knowledge. It is really aimed towards beginners but even as a professional it might be useful.

courseDetails.title: How Websites Work
courseDetails.shortDescription: Make Your Own Websites
courseDetails.longDescription:
Websites are everywhere these days. They provide information and interact with users through different platforms, such as computers, tablets, and smartphones. A website is a network of linked web pages that users access through their web browsers. A user can access a website only when he or she has a web browser to process the code used to create the website’s content.

A website is made up of HTML code, which stands for Hypertext Markup Language. HTML is the main language used to create websites. This code defines the look and behavior of a website’s pages using tags and attributes. Web pages can be viewed in different web browsers— such as Microsoft Internet Explorer or Google Chrome.

In this course you will learn how websites work and be able to create your own web pages. You will understand basics like HTML, JavaScript and CSS. On top of that, you will learn about Security vulnerabilities that sometimes occur with web pages. Indeed, this is not just a Web Development course but it has a Cyber Security components as well!

If you are new to Web Development and Cyber Security, this course is for you! No prior knowledge required. The course includes exercises that let you play around with HTML code and more.
targetAudiences: Beginner Web Developers
